verses.t: And after{H310} this it came to pass, that David{H1732} smote{H5221} the Philistines{H6430}, and subdued{H3665} them: and David{H1732} took{H3947} Metheg–ammah{H4965} out of the hand{H3027} of the Philistines{H6430}.Metheg–ammah: or, the bridle of Ammah
